Sentencas: High efficiency and high reliability with low emission of solid oxide fuel cell make them one of the best choices for distributed generation systems.
Titulo: Using inlet guide vane to improve load following ability of solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: Furthermore, the gas turbine power generation systems are completely developed in recent decades.
Titulo: Using inlet guide vane to improve load following ability of solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: Hybrid cycle of SOFC and gas turbine gathers these points and introduces the highest possible efficient system for building heating and power.
Titulo: Using inlet guide vane to improve load following ability of solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: The behavior of this cycle can be studied from a model of fuel cell, gas turbine and balance of plant.
Titulo: Using inlet guide vane to improve load following ability of solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: For each component a model is developed and the performance of the overall system analyzed by integrating each model.
Titulo: Using inlet guide vane to improve load following ability of solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: Load variation for SOFC-GT hybrid cycle in residential application is very wide.
Titulo: Using inlet guide vane to improve load following ability of solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: To adjust the net power and choosing best operation point for SOFC-GT hybrid cycle, an inlet guide vane (IGV) is used in the inlet of the compressor.
Titulo: Using inlet guide vane to improve load following ability of solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: In this study by using a dynamic model, transient effect of IGV angle on performance of SOFC-GT hybrid cycle is investigated.
Titulo: Using inlet guide vane to improve load following ability of solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: Also this model can be used for designing a controller for safe operation of this cycle while satisfying constraints of the hybrid cycle.
Titulo: Using inlet guide vane to improve load following ability of solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: Results showed that by using IGV, the off-design performance of the SOFC-GT cycle is enhanced.
Titulo: Using inlet guide vane to improve load following ability of solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid cycle
